definitions.title: pr. 2 ms.
definitions.body: thou (BH [[אַתָּה]] p. 61:b; Cappad. and Eg. Aram. [[אנת]] (Lab:Eph. i. 67; S-C:A 11 +,

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: [[אנתי]] ib. D9, 11, 26+), Nerab [[את]] (Cooke:186. 190), Palm. [[אנת]] (ib.:308); Targum:o [[את]], Targum:J [[אנת]] (D:§ 16.1); Syr. 0a(n)t);—thou, Da 2:29, Da 2:31, Da 2:37, Da 2:38 etc., Ezr 7:25.
